title-group.article-title: The treatment of spatial data in probabilistic classification

permissions.copyright-statement: © Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, ELTE

abstract.p: The Similarity Index, Affinity Index and Deviant Index described previously as probability-based tools for use in numerical taxonomy are extended to cover attributes, such as geographical distribution, which can be described in terms of quantities in spatially defined cells - for instance, the squares of a grid.
